urls.description: Your one stop website for up to date information about flooding, weather and traffic disruptions across the Borough of Calderdale.

tweets.text: An @EnvAgencyYNE flood alert is in force for the Upper River Calder catchment. This means flooding is possible so please be ready to follow your flood plan and check https://t.co/SOPqHGairw for updates and preparation advice. https://t.co/zQPzzDDagt
We have abrogated our rights to critique Indonesia or anywhere else. Where are our regulators? - Never around when they‚Äôre needed. Come on @EnvAgency https://t.co/JToa2HLUg2

Where do you think this litter-filled river is? Indonesia maybe? No - this is Wigan in Lancashire. The litter comes down from the town and gathers here where the river dips under the canal. There are moves to fix it but it isn't going to be easy. @lizbonnin @LDNWaterkeeper https://t.co/tTRyInERVp
@RussellB1ggs @The_WMA @DefraWater @NaturalEngland @jamesowild @N_Rivers_Trust @EnvAgencyAnglia @WestNorfolkBC Yes a restoration would be great. Here is the original https://t.co/lEhMH6lO0k

With yet another local authority signing up enhance and protect Staffordshire‚Äôs #NatureRecoveryNetwork we edge closer to full countywide adoption. @CraigBennett3 @StaffsWildlife @NE_WestMids @EnvAgencyMids @WildlifeTrusts https://t.co/9cwjev7DYG

Our ¬£35m upgrade of Keadby Pumping Station near #Scunthorpe #Lincolnshire is well underway but means these 80-year-old diesel pumps are on the last runs and will be decommissioned in the next few weeks. 
More info https://t.co/n37U1kVsfO #flood #Trent https://t.co/mQNSNGL0eX
@EnvAgency With more than 80% of complaints made you you nationally, being about the landfill site at Walley's Quarry. How are you allowing this to continue? https://t.co/lQerICMmop

tweets.text: @MissyDoom @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @NewsNBC @PublicHealthEng 100%. @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids  you can go out for a few hours and the air has cleared in the area, yet indoors retains it. tweets.text: "Part of the problem is that it‚Äôs currently too simple to gain a waste carrying licence that enables firms to transport and dispose of waste‚Äù @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK https://t.co/PhOlM7tJhm

State of the #RiveLea Diversion #StonebridgeLock today #LoveTheLea @wfcouncil @haringeycouncil @thameswater @EnvAgency @LDN_environment @CanalRiverTrust @LeeValleyPark @Thames21 https://t.co/yDcQ0buFLT

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency This fact is most of the violations were never documented, i e weren't reported, as people walking or driving around the countryside don't know the law. There would have been many many thousands of violations.

243 documented violations in 2 years and not a single prosecution. And guess what? Yep, you got it.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/VvjLy78nDI

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency None of the violations I reported have led to prosecutions. I'm not even sure the farmers were visited for most of them. My photographs were the only evidence. One regular perp ended up with another cat 1 incident though . He'd been told to increase his slurry storage long before
